message:
(UX Discussion)
Dears, What do u think about multi level menu with a lot of links in mobile view (almost in portals) ? 

Do u think it should be restructured to match the mobile view ( i mean is it should be changed with new information architecture "sitemap" like adaptive design ?
Also do u prefer menus with scroll bar in mobile ?

I checked the following sites with various solutions :
http://www.theguardian.com/
http://www.bbc.com/

Kindly provide me with good examples that do u like
story: Ahmed Saeid shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
